executable.title: RemoveParticlesFromParticlesDataSet
executable.description: This program accepts two inputs: a particles dataset and another particles dataset\ indicating which particles should be removed from the first dataset. The output of the set of particles \ in the first dataset but not in the second.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and women's hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National \ Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors \ and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

string.name: outFileName
string.label: Output particles file name
string.description: Output particle data set file name. The particles in the output will consist\ of the particles in the data set specified with the -i flag minus the particles in\ the data set specified with the -r flag.Output particle data set file name

string.name: removeFileName
string.label: Remove particles file name
string.description: Particle data set file name indicating which particles should be removed from\ the input data set
